language.invalid: Invalid local provided, `:local` is not a supported language.
language.note: :information_source: *You can use `:command [local]` to change the language that is used on this server, by default the language will be set to `:default`!*

modules.enabled: The `:module` module has been **enabled** for the <#:channelid> channel.
modules.disabled: The `:module` module has been **disabled** for the <#:channelid> channel.
modules.not-enabled: The `:module` module is not enabled, enable it first with `:command`

messages.set-message:
The `:module` module message has been set to:

`:message`
messages.set-default: The `:module` modules message has been set back to the default message.
